meanings.definition: A pair of people or things.
meanings.sent1: The dynamic duo completed the puzzle together.
meanings.sent2: The duo of socks was neatly folded in the drawer.
meanings.sent3: The duo of kittens played hide and seek in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like a duo of stars shining brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The duo of best friends always had each other's backs.

meanings.definition: A musical group consisting of two members.
meanings.sent1: The talented duo performed a beautiful melody on stage.
meanings.sent2: The duo released their new album last week.
meanings.sent3: The duo of musicians had the audience dancing all night long.
meanings.sent4: Their voices blended together like a harmonious duo.
meanings.sent5: The duo's music echoed through the concert hall, captivating everyone.
